name: yamdbf
description: Yet Another Modular Discord Bot Framework: A lightweight framework for quickly creating new Discord.js bots.

scripts.docs:stable: jsdoc -R examples/FrontPage.md -c .jsdoc.json -u examples -r bin -d ../yamdbf-docs/ && jsdoc -c .jsdoc.json -t templates/haruki -r bin -d console > ../yamdbf-docs/docs.json
scripts.docs:indev: jsdoc -R examples/FrontPage.md -c .jsdoc.json -u examples -r bin -d ../yamdbf-docs/indev/ && jsdoc -c .jsdoc.json -t templates/haruki -r bin -d console > ../yamdbf-docs/indev/docs.json

author: Zackary Campbell <zajrik@gmail.com>
